nodes.text: The Morellian Commonwealth was a Wild Space star cluster. It contained several star systems, including the Morellia system, the site of the astronomical object of the same name.

The Morellian Commonwealth was home to a long-lived near-Human species known as the Morellians. The Morellian systems utilized technology of a relatively low level, and tasked the Morellian Enforcers with maintaining law and order within the Commonwealth. The Morellian Barosa Warren was born on Morellia approximately 160 years before 2 ABY, and, by that year, was believed to be the last Morellian in existence.
The Morellian Commonwealth was introduced in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a 1995 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
